Name: Issuance of building permits for areas in which a certified rezoning application is pending.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the issuance of building permits for areas in which a certified rezoning application is pending.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1.  Section 28-103.11 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 33 for the year 2007, is amended to read as follows:
§28-103.11 Applications and permits. The department shall receive and review applications, construction documents, and other submittal documents and shall issue permits, in accordance with the provisions of this code. Upon certification by the city planning commission of an application for rezoning any area of the city, the department shall not issue any permits for construction on a site located in such area that would not be in compliance with the zoning for such area provided for in the certified rezoning application.  
	§2. This local law shall take effect thirty days after its enactment.

BKH
Int. 932-2009
3/23/2010 10:49 AM
